knimeNode.name: Clean HTML Retriever
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node parses HTML content, clean up errors and output result in proper XHTML format.

fullDescription.intro: This node takes URL from a column, retrieves its content (assuming to be in HTML form) for parsing. If HTML content is available in another column, it can take HTML content directly instead of pulling from URL. HTML content is then parsed and cleaned up using HtmlCleaner to output in XHTML form. The result can be configured to output in either String for XML type.
fullDescription.option: Content column name. If available, the node will use this content instead of pulling from URL.
Column name of the resulting parsed XHTML content, default name is "XHTML".
Output result as String or XML type. XML type is useful when this node is part of XML analysis workflow.
User agent to be used in header for HTTP request.
Number of retries after a failure per URL requests.

ports.inPort: An input table that contains URL / content columns
ports.outPort: An output table URL and XHTML results
